eduversum.name: Blender
eduversum.description: Blender is an open-source 3D-Graphics program. With Blender you can model three dimensional object, you can texture them (cover them with a specific material), animate them and render them. Blender offers a built-in video editor and a player-engine.In the last few years the program was dynamically developed and new functions were added like for example the possibility to simulate liquids and compositing.
